| History                 = The Concrete Dragons were a gang from [[Manhattan]], till they were crushed by the [[Poison Memories (Earth-616)|Poison Memories]] and relocated to [[Queens]]. They were led by [[Aaron Chord (Earth-616)|Midnight's Fire]] and after he left, his sister [[Silhouette Chord (Earth-616)|Silhouette]] helped the gang by keeping them out of serious trouble. The gang was involved in drugs and theft of merchandise from dock and cargo terminals.{{r|Night Thrasher Vol 1 2|4}}
